pkgmetadata.longdescription: pulp_file=========.. warning:: This pulp plugin has been merged into the main pulpcore project. This repository can only accept bugfixes on release branches... figure:: https://github.com/pulp/pulp_file/actions/workflows/nightly.yml/badge.svg?branch=main :alt: File Nightly CI/CDA Pulp plugin to support hosting arbitrary files.For more information, please see the `documentation <https://docs.pulpproject.org/pulp_file/>`_or the `Pulp project page <https://pulpproject.org>`_.
